## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Explain the architectural perspective on web application development
2. Identify common patterns in modern web system design
3. Understand the role of containers in modern development workflows
4. Set up a Docker-based development environment
5. Use Docker Compose to define multi-service applications

## Preparation

Before class, please:

- Install [Docker Desktop](https://www.docker.com/products/docker-desktop/)
- Install [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/)
- Create a [GitHub](https://github.com/) account if you don't have one
- Review the [course syllabus](../../syllabus.qmd)
